column4: http://wiki.ubuntu.com/InternetRelayChat  doesnt say anything about not using curse words...
put something in the topic about it
i try to obey irc chan rules
but if the rule doesnt exist...
so what? Etiquette is often unspoken without clear rules. It would be absurd for us to make a rigid list of all acecptable behaviour
no, but it is an IRC channel; and yes, IRC channels emulate life in many ways.
did you install mplayer-mozilla or whatever it is?
restarted firefox? I find it hard to believe that it's not working if you really do have the mozilla-mplayer package...
and, also, the wiki is a good place to dig around in.
